N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7679.1 - Policy

State Regulations

In order to provide inmates with the opportunity to pursue
educational, vocational, informational or recreational interests and reduce
idleness during incarceration, the department shall ensure that each
correctional facility provides inmates regular access to library services. Such
library services shall be designed and administered to support, broaden and
strengthen each facility's total program. Notes
